sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import styled from 'styled-components';

const LogoContainer = styled.div`
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: ${props => props.theme.spacing.sm};
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: ${props => props.theme.transitions.base};
  
  &:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
  }
`;

const LogoIcon = styled.div`
  width: ${props => props.size === 'large' ? '48px' : props.size === 'medium' ? '36px' : '28px'};
  height: ${props => props.size === 'large' ? '48px' : props.size === 'medium' ? '36px' : '28px'};
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
`;

const LogoText = styled.span`
  font-family: ${props => props.theme.fonts.primary};
  font-weight: ${props => props.theme.fontWeights.bold};
  font-size: ${props => props.size === 'large' ? props.theme.fontSizes['2xl'] : 
                        props.size === 'medium' ? props.theme.fontSizes.xl : 
                        props.theme.fontSizes.lg};
  background: ${props => props.theme.colors.gradientPrimary};
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
  background-clip: text;
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
`;

const LokanexLogo = ({ size = 'medium', showText = true, ...props }) => {
  return (
    <LogoContainer {...props}>
      <LogoIcon size={size}>
        <svg
          width="100%"
          height="100%"
          viewBox="0 0 100 100"
          fill="none"
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
        >
          {/* Background glow effect */}
          <circle
            cx="50"
            cy="50"
            r="48"
            fill="url(#bgGlow)"
            opacity="0.3"
          />
          
          {/* Large blue L shape with enhanced styling */}
          <path
            d="M10 10 L10 90 L90 90 L90 75 L35 75 L35 25 L25 25 L25 10 Z"
            fill="url(#blueGradient)"
            stroke="url(#blueStroke)"
            strokeWidth="0.5"
            filter="url(#blueShadow)"
          />
          
          {/* Orange triangle with enhanced styling */}
          <polygon
            points="75,15 75,35 90,35"
            fill="url(#orangeGradient)"
            stroke="url(#orangeStroke)"
            strokeWidth="0.5"
            filter="url(#orangeShadow)"
          />
          
          {/* Subtle connection line */}
          <line
            x1="35"
            y1="25"
            x2="75"
            y2="15"
            stroke="url(#connectionGradient)"
            strokeWidth="1"
            opacity="0.4"
            strokeDasharray="2,2"
          />
          
          {/* Micro accent dots */}
          <circle cx="20" cy="20" r="1" fill="url(#accent1)" opacity="0.6" />
          <circle cx="80" cy="80" r="1" fill="url(#accent2)" opacity="0.6" />
          <circle cx="15" cy="85" r="1" fill="url(#accent3)" opacity="0.6" />
          <circle cx="85" cy="15" r="1" fill="url(#accent4)" opacity="0.6" />
          
          {/* Gradients and Effects */}
          <defs>
            <radialGradient id="bgGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" stopOpacity="0.2" />
              <stop offset="70%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" stopOpacity="0.1" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff6b35" stopOpacity="0.05" />
            </radialGradient>
            <linearGradient id="blueGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="30%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="70%" stopColor="#0099cc" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="blueStroke" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ffffff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#e0e0e0" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="orangeGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="30%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
              <stop offset="70%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="orangeStroke" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ffffff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ffe0d0" />
            </linearGradient>
            <linearGradient id="connectionGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
            </linearGradient>
            <radialGradient id="accent1" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#0099cc" />
            </radialGradient>
            <radialGradient id="accent2" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#4ecdc4" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#44a08d" />
            </radialGradient>
            <radialGradient id="accent3" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#ff6b35" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#ff8c42" />
            </radialGradient>
            <radialGradient id="accent4" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%">
              <stop offset="0%" stopColor="#00d4ff" />
              <stop offset="100%" stopColor="#0099cc" />
            </radialGradient>
            
            {/* Shadow filters */}
            <filter id="blueShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
              <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="2" stdDeviation="3" floodColor="#00d4ff" floodOpacity="0.3"/>
            </filter>
            <filter id="orangeShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
              <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="2" stdDeviation="3" floodColor="#ff6b35" floodOpacity="0.3"/>
            </filter>
          </defs>
        </svg>
      </LogoIcon>
      {showText && <LogoText size={size}>Lokanex</LogoText>}
    </LogoContainer>
  );
};

export default LokanexLogo;
